sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: STOICS, the name given to a ſect of Grecian philoſophers, from Στοα, “ the porch in Athens,” which the founder of the ſect choſe for his ſchool. For the peculiar tenets of this ſect, ſee Metaphysics, Chap. IV. Fart 3. MOral Philosophy, n⁰ 8. and ZENo.
